author: AP
title: Virus tests crucial if German soccer to resume soon
description: German soccer needs regular coronavirus testing and political backing in order to resume amid the pandemic
content:
DÜSSELDORF, Germany (AP) — German soccer needs regular coronavirus testing and political backing in order to resume amid the pandemic.
Securing both is a challenge.
If the Bundesliga can be first of Europe’s major soccer leagues to return, it would ease the… [+2619 chars]
